Plot: The life and work of photographer Sebastião Salgado, who has spent forty years documenting deprived societies in hidden corners of the world.
Title: The Salt of the Earth
Writer: Wim Wenders, Juliano Ribeiro Salgado, David Rosier
Actors: Sebastião Salgado, Wim Wenders, Lélia Wanick Salgado, Juliano Ribeiro Salgado
tomatoConsensus: While the work it honors may pose thorny ethical questions that Salt of the Earth neglects to answer, it remains a shattering, thought-provoking testament to Sebastião Salgado's career.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 10 nominations.
